tool.name: step_to_dagmc_convertor
tool.description: The tools converts step files into dagmc .h5m format
tool.command:
cp '$plasma_Step' 'Plasma.step' && cp '$blanket_Step' 'Blanket_I.step' && cp '$vaccum_Step' 'Vacuum.step' && cp '$firstwall_Step' 'First_Wall.step' && python3 '$__tool_directory__/convertor_stp_files.py' &&
mv dagmc.h5m '$dagmc_File'

data.name: dagmc_File
data.label: dagmc_File
data.help: Txt file to print to the h5m_out. Format: txt

tool.help: This tool run the command writes the file input 'Text_To_Write' to the txt file 'Output_File' in an Ubuntu 20.04 container. This is done via a python script to demonstrate running scripts in Galaxy tools. Expected output: h5m_out: '' h5m_err: '' outputs: Output_File: Content of the 'File_To_Write' input
